meanings.definition: The act of placing goods on pallets for storage or transportation.
meanings.sent1: The palletization of the boxes made it easier to move them around the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse manager oversaw the palletization of the inventory to ensure efficient storage.
meanings.sent3: I tried to palletize my toys at home, but my little brother kept knocking them over.
meanings.sent4: The palletization of ideas in the presentation helped the audience understand the concept better.
meanings.sent5: The palletization of colors in the painting created a harmonious composition.

meanings.definition: The process of organizing items on pallets for efficient handling.
meanings.sent1: Efficient palletization of products in the factory reduced the time needed for loading trucks.
meanings.sent2: Proper palletization is crucial for smooth operations in the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The workers joked that the palletization of the boxes was like playing a giant game of Tetris.
meanings.sent4: The palletization of tasks in the project management software simplified the workflow.
meanings.sent5: The careful palletization of books on the shelves made it easy to find specific titles.

meanings.definition: The technique of using pallets to store or transport goods.
meanings.sent1: The company adopted palletization to streamline their logistics process.
meanings.sent2: Palletization has revolutionized the way goods are handled in the industry.
meanings.sent3: During the camping trip, we improvised a palletization system to carry our supplies.
meanings.sent4: The art exhibition showcased the creative palletization of sculptures in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The palletization of materials in the construction site saved time and effort for the workers.
